programme.title: Takut Ke Tak
programme.desc: The movie follows five film students who are planning to shoot a movie at a haunted house. However, strange and creepy things begin happening to them there.

programme.title: Low Season
programme.desc: When her ability to see ghosts ruins her love life, a heartbroken woman seeks solace at a mountain resort, encountering several fellow, lonely singletons.

programme.title: Seram Selebriti Ep01
programme.desc: Seram Selebriti adalah rancangan yang akan menceritakan pengalaman artis-artis Malaysia tentang alam mistik.

programme.title: Tokmoh Talent Agency
programme.desc: Seorang bomoh cuba mempelbagaikan sumber pendapatan dengan menyewakan hantu untuk digunakan sebagai pelakon tambahan dalam filem-filem seram.

programme.title: Haunting Me
programme.desc: Four aging drag queens who run a boarding house for boys try all sorts of crazy schemes to get rid of the ghosts haunting their dormitory.

programme.title: Susuk
programme.desc: A filial son seeks help from a religious man when his mother behaves strangely, possibly as a result of practising black magic.

programme.title: Matilahnak
programme.desc: Apabila penduduk Kampung Matilahnak tidak lagi takut pada hantu, Boss, selaku ketua hantu perlu mencari jalan supaya orang kampung kembali takutkan mereka.

programme.title: Arumi
programme.desc: 15 years after the murder of her mother and sister, Rasty invites four friends to her parents' villa. Intending only to vacation at the villa, they end up with far more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Ghost Father
programme.desc: A student is hired as a live-in nanny to a wealthy woman's little girl. But spooky things happen every night in the lonely secluded mansion. Will the truth be exposed?

programme.title: Sesat
programme.desc: An e-hailing driver has strange adventures after her ignores the instructions of an old lady. He is trapped in a loop and cannot seem to get out.

programme.title: The Slit Mouthed Woman
programme.desc: Decades ago, a suburb was terrorized by the spirit of a woman in a surgical mask who asked victims, "Am I pretty?" before slaughtering them. Now, police and teachers must end a new wave of carnage.

programme.title: Dead Bite
programme.desc: A comedy-horror venture about an aspiring hiphop group who head to Mermaid Island to shoot a music video, expecting bikini-clad girls and sunshine but end up battling ghouls and demons.

programme.title: The Werewolf Game -The Villagers's Side
programme.desc: 10 high school students are kidnapped and forced to participate to play a deadly game.

programme.title: Office Uprising

programme.desc: A homeowner is found unresponsive in his pool. Good Samaritans remove an explosive device taped to a goose. A town comes together to save a boy trapped in a well.

programme.title: Rescue Cam S1 Ep20
programme.desc: A driver is trapped in a tornado. A snowboarder is caught in the middle of an avalanche. A choking man runs to his neighbours for help.

programme.title: I Love You... but I Lied S2 Ep15
programme.desc: A pregnant woman's perfect life is not all it appears to be and a dead father's secret life is haunting those he's left behind.

programme.title: See No Evil S5 Ep03
programme.desc: On November 7 2014, 69-year old Ina Clare Richardson is found brutally murdered in a public park in Clarkston, Washington. With no witnesses to the crime, investigators turn to surveillance cameras.

programme.title: Hunting JonBenet's Killer: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Elizabeth Vargas takes a look at the most notorious cold case murder in American history. Featuring an exclusive interview with John Ramsey, as well as never-before-seen photos.

programme.title: Fatal Vows S4 Ep01
programme.desc: Wild-child Kim is on a mission to turn her life around when she meets Frank, a beacon of stability. They say opposites attract-but in this case it's fatal attraction.

programme.title: The First 48 Presents: Critical Minutes S1 Ep03
programme.desc: In Tulsa, a beloved barber is caught in the crossfire of a long-standing gang rivalry. In Atlanta, a young man returns home during his lunch break and is killed by an armed burglar.

programme.title: Guiltology S1 Ep03
programme.desc: In 1982, a serial killer was at large for two decades, amassing a body count of over 50 women. Advanced techniques of forensic microscopy helped in gathering evidence against him.

programme.title: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole S1 Ep09
programme.desc: Chronicles the chilling crimes and the impact on the victims' loved ones as they grapple with the uncertain reality that these convicted offenders could possibly be released back into their communities.

programme.title: See No Evil S4 Ep16
programme.desc: 19-year-old student Maple Batalia is found brutally murdered in the parking lot of Simon Fraser University in British Columbia. The campus camera system reveals a car following Maple before she is killed.

programme.title: I Survived a Crime S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Convenience store customers witness a cold-blooded murder and are barricaded inside the store by a homicidal gunman, and a restaurant worker is robbed at gunpoint but is saved by a drive-through customer.

programme.title: I Survived a Crime S1 Ep12
programme.desc: A woman is stalked in her apartment, a man stops a carjacking by using an unusual weapon against his attackers, a convenience store clerk uses his martial arts training to stave off a robber, and more.

programme.title: The First 48 S24 Ep444
programme.desc: In Mobile, a professor of economics is found shot dead outside his bedroom door when he doesn't show up for class.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty or Innocent? S1 Ep03
programme.desc: After years of caring for a sick child, is a mother hiding a terrible secret? Accused of attempting to murder her son, she is now fighting for her freedom.

programme.title: Stalked by a Ghost S1 Ep02
programme.desc: Clairvoyant Cindy Goldenberg communicates with deceased loved ones, spirit guides and angels, and has extensive experience with clients who are being haunted relentlessly by their ghostly counterparts.

programme.title: Ted Bundy: Serial Monster S1 Ep04

programme.desc: It's snowing in Windsor Gardens; Paddington has lost a special wooly hat given him by Aunt Lucy and must find it.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S2 Ep212
programme.desc: Gabby has the perfect tool to get Blaze ready to race: a special remote that can control any machine. But when Crusher takes her remote, he activates machines all over town to slow Blaze down.

programme.desc: Dazzle thinks her new robot will make everyone's jobs easy-peasy, but instead it creates kitchen chaos!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep224
programme.desc: Peppa wins the top prize in a school raffle: a hot air balloon trip. Peppa and her family climb aboard, enjoying the trip until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, they land in a familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep225
programme.desc: Peppa and George love jumping in puddles even in the rain, but George takes off his rain hat and catches a cold. He feels better after awhile. Now he is happy to wear his hat, even when it isn't raining.

programme.desc: Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet.
